website_summaries.verdict: A well-loved brand with a loyal following, these socks are a decent budget option if odor control and breathability are more of a concern than durability.
pros: Enhanced with patented Fresh IQ Odor Protection Technology
Wash well with no pilling or shrinkage
cons: Wear out faster than other athletic socks

customer_reviews.title: ZERO % cotton, and they contain LATEX! What about people with latex allergies?
customer_reviews.text: The label reads 97% polyester, 1% natural latex rubber, 1% spandex, and 1 % nylon. So they contain ZERO % cotton. Two questions: what about people with LATEX ALLERGIES, and who is going to fix this?
customer_reviews.author: Peter in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Did they say 84% cotton?
customer_reviews.text: Description states: 84% Cotton, 14% Polyester, 2% Nylon. Packaging states: 97% Polyester, 1% Natural Latex, 1% Spanex, 1% Nylon. Look elsewhere if you want cotton socks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Janda Jr.

customer_reviews.title: but I was very disappointed. They look and feel very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these are very low-quality socks. I bought them because they were made by a name brand, but I was very disappointed. They look and feel very cheap. I washed them (hoping the fabric would tighten up a little bit), but I think they're mostly man-made material because they didn't shrink at all. It feels like I'm wearing cheese cloth on my feet... I wore a couple pairs and then just threw them all away.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Besides thin material, these socks are short: about ...
customer_reviews.text: Besides thin material, these socks are short: about 1 1/4" shorter than a crew sock should be. Is Hanes spending too much money on advertising when they should be spending that money on FABRIC. I guess now-a-days when you buy Hanes you're buying HYPE. If there's anything I can't stand: it's a short sock. These will be going right to the thrift store, where perhaps 50 cents/pair is a more realistic "retail" price. I hope Hanes investors are making money - because I just threw $12 away.
customer_reviews.author: bertwest

customer_reviews.title: Too big.  Hanes doesn't care about it's customers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a Hanes store and they were too big. They wouldn't let me return them since they were worn. (1 sock was worn for about 10 seconds). Conclusion: I will never buy Hanes products again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Elastic died.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was fine, but after i washed them 4 or 5 times the elastic just died in them. As you pull them up you can hear the stuff braking ...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: These socks are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I thought Hanes was a good middle of the road brand. These socks are unusable. I threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Haggstrom

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality sock
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality sock. Hanes should be embarrassed these are so thin. Never again will I buy these. Go to Sam's and get theirs. They're still a good quality sock for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maro

customer_reviews.title: Not soft/pliable
customer_reviews.text: These socks are not soft or pliable, the elastic material in them feels like it’ll be gone be within a a couple washes rather than a couple dozen washes.
customer_reviews.author: Ktawfik

customer_reviews.title: WORST SOCKS - EVEN AFTER LIKE 3 WASHES THEY STILL ...
customer_reviews.text: WORST SOCKS - EVEN AFTER LIKE 3 WASHES THEY STILL SHED AND LEAVE BLACK STUFF ALL OVER YOUR FEET SUPER CHEAP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hanes Men's FreshIQ Crew Socks 12 Pack
product_meta.description: Crew socks made with cotton for all over softness, superior fit and ultimate durability
feature_bullets: 98% Polyester/1% Nylon/1% Spandex; 97% Polyester/1% Nylon/1% Spandex/1% Natural Latex Rubber
Fresh IQ advanced odor protection technology attacks odor-causing bacteria in your clothing to help you feel fresh all day
12-pair pack. Crew length socks stay up and hits at mid-calf
Comfort toe seam, our most comfortable seam ever
Grey cushioned sole for extra comfort
Crew socks each featuring ribbed leg
